name: noteMappingMode
column7: pitch/slice/both/repeat (repeat means sounds is not altered at all)

name: numSlices
column7: 0=auto per n notes, 1=auto per onsets, 2-128=from 2 to 128 equally spaced slices

name: playheadPosition
column7: this is only used in “freeze” mode, and represents the playhead position from 0=sound start, to 1=sound end

name: freezePlayheadSpeed
column7: speed modifier for the max speed at which playhead moves into the direction of target playhead in freeze mode

name: midiRootNote
column7: midi note that will play the sound at original speed

name: pitch
column7: semitones (with respect to midi root note)

name: mod2GainAmt
column7: gain amount to be added with AT (in dB)

name: vel2CutoffAmt
column7: velocity to cutoff amount (multiplier to cutoff frequency)

name: vel2GainAmt
column7: percentage of how much velocity affects gain ¡
